output.description: Incoming event data in XML format
All kinds of flags collected during extraction of configuration data, etc.
Any ITSM data from the event.
action ID received from event source.
ITSM authentication token. May be null, if Remedy REST URL is empty.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//data/event)"> <xsl:copy-of select="//data/event" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> <status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </status> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration:Utilities:Add Event Type And Action ID to Event Data

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:variable name="tsoErrorReason">${status reason}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="tsoErrorMessage">${error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="tsErrorMessage">${ts error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="itsmErrorMessage">${itsm error message}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsoErrorReason)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('TSO login error reason: ', $tsoErrorReason, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsoErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('TSO login error message: ', $tsoErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($tsErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Event source login error message: ', $tsErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(normalize-space($itsmErrorMessage)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('ITSM login error message: ', $itsmErrorMessage, '. ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat('Login to TSO using URL: ', //BAO/URL/text(), ' and User ID: ', //BAO/UserName/text())

//Defaults/UseRemedyJavaAPI/text() = 'true' or //Defaults/BypassITSM/text() = 'true' or (//Defaults/UseRemedyJavaAPI/text() = 'false' and //Defaults/BypassITSM/text() = 'false' and string-length(normalize-space('${auth token}')) > 0)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <itsm-data> <xsl:apply-templates select="//extendedData/nameValueList/nameValue[contains(name, 'itsm')]" mode="itsm" /> </itsm-data> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="nameValue" mode="itsm"> <xsl:variable name="elemName" select="name/text()" /> <xsl:element name="{$elemName}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.to: get host details from custom source

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="eventType" select="substring-before(substring-after('${action id}', "-"), "-")" /> <xsl:variable name="id" select="substring-after(substring-after('${action id}', "-"), "-")" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//*[name() = '${event source type}']/EventTypes/*[name() = $eventType]//*/configuration[id=$id]/supports-get-host-details)"> <xsl:value-of select="//*[name() = '${event source type}']/EventTypes/*[name() = $eventType]//*/configuration[id=$id]/supports-get-host-details/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: get host details from custom source

input.value: Failed to extract target host connection details from credentials store for host:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="delim" select="//Defaults/SupportedActionsDelimiter/text()" /> <xsl:variable name="actionId" select="substring-after('${action id}', concat('${event source type}', $delim, '${event type}', $delim))" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Specifics/*[name() = '${event source type}']/EventTypes/*[name() = '${event type}']/Configurations/configurations/configuration[id=$actionId]" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <flags> <continue-processing>${continueprocessing}</continue-processing> <status> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status> <change-enabled>${change enabled}</change-enabled> <incident-enabled>${incident enabled}</incident-enabled> <remediation-enabled>${remediation enabled}</remediation-enabled> <event-source-incident-integration-enabled>${event source incident integration enabled}</event-source-incident-integration-enabled> </flags> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Extract Event specific data, configuration data based on the event type
